name: Crock-Pot Chicken and Rice Casserole
author: C. Allen Collier

ingredients.name: small can cream of chicken soup
small can cream of celery soup
small can cream of mushroom soup

instructions: Mix in crock-pot the 3 cans of soup and rice. Place the chicken on top of the mixture, then add the diced celery. Cook for 3 hours on high or 4 hours on low. More rice, about 1?2 cup, and 2 additional chicken breasts may be added to make 6 servings.
